explains: v. （使）等同；使（两个或两个以上事物）相等，使平衡
wordGroup: equate with 把…等同；使相等；同等相待

sentences.en: I don't see how you can equate the two things.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你怎么能把这两件事等同起来。

sentences.en: The author doesn't equate liberalism and conservatism.
sentences.cn: 该作者没有将自由主义等同于保守主义。

sentences.en: You cannot equate his poems with his plays.
sentences.cn: 你不可以把他的诗歌和他的剧本相提并论。
